projects.title: Realms of Reality Portal - Google Chrome Extension
projects.description: A custom Chrome extension featuring dynamic backgrounds, a weather widget, inspirational quotes, a time display, a Google search bar, and a collection of useful links. This project aims to provide users with a visually appealing and functional dashboard every time they open their browsers.

projects.title: Boo's Haunted Hop - 3D Platformer
projects.description: An engaging 3D platformer mini-game built with Unity, featuring three-levels of interactive environments where the user jumps from platform to platform to reach the flag at the top of the map. During gameplay, a timer tracks until the flag is found in all three rounds.

projects.title: Virtual Beach Vibes - VR 360 Video
projects.description: A VR experience developed for Meta Quest in a Tropical theme. The program comes complete with a VR-friendly user interface, robust video playback system, smooth transitions between videos, four video worlds to view, and a little humor in the UI content. All this together helps the user feel as if they've gone on a mini tropical vacation, with no sunscreen required!

projects.title: Slimeageddon: Street Hunter - AR Slingshot
projects.description: An AR slingshot mobile app developed with Unity 6 for Android and iOS where players hunt slimes in real-world settings. This apps key features include horizontal plane detection, target spawning within real-world spaces, projectile launching, and an intricate UI system.
